Articles.Content:
ksp has few waterfall mods to add to the core mod by some of them are not working properly combined.

Waterfall core + Stock Waterfall Effects - Few plumes broken (moved and overscalled)

Waterfall core + Stock Waterfall Effects + Waterfall Restock - no engine lights

Waterfall core + Waterfall Restock - no engine lights too?

Stock Waterfall Effects adds 3 vector engine options so i don’t want to play without it. Anyone knows the answer for this issue and witch configuration is the best? Or maybe what other mods may be causing this problem?
